content:
# It appears that despite my previous attempts to craft and place the **Burner Mining Drill**, it is not present in the inventory. 

# This indicates that there may have been an issue during the crafting process or that the drill was not successfully added to the inventory after crafting.

# To resolve this, I will attempt to craft the **Burner Mining Drill** once more, ensuring that I have the necessary components available.

# First, I will check the inventory again to confirm the availability of the required components for crafting the drill:
iron_gear_wheel_needed = 3  # Each drill requires 3 iron gear wheels
iron_plates_needed = 5  # Each drill also requires 5 iron plates
fuel_needed = 2  # It requires 2 units of coal as fuel

# Check the inventory for required components
inventory = inspect_inventory()

can_craft_drill = (
    inventory[Prototype.IronGearWheel.value[0]] >= iron_gear_wheel_needed and
    inventory[Prototype.IronPlate.value[0]] >= iron_plates_needed and
    inventory[Prototype.Coal.value[0]] >= fuel_needed
)

if can_craft_drill:
    # Craft the Burner Mining Drill
    craft_item(Prototype.BurnerMiningDrill)
    print("Successfully crafted a Burner Mining Drill.")
else:
    print("Not enough resources to craft the Burner Mining Drill.")

# After crafting, I will check the inventory again to confirm the creation of the drill.
print(f"Updated Inventory: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check final inventory after crafting attempt
